website_summaries.verdict: A slim-fitting heated jacket that will keep you toasty, provided you don't get one that comes with one or more of the reported concerns.
pros: Includes detachable hood and battery pack
Charge lasts up to 8 hours on low
Slim fit is comfortable and attractive
cons: Sizes tend to run on the small side
Some quality issues noted, including broken zippers and "dud" batteries/chargers

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is incredible lol. They have a very fancy bag inside the very fancy box that comes in the regular amazon box. The jacket was folded very nicely with directions directly on top. The battery is actually way smaller than I was expecting. It warms up very fast which is great. And it has a one button interface which keeps things simple. You cannot tell there are heating units inside even when you run your hands down the inside of the back to feel for them. Not only are the heating elements warming, the jacket itself is well insulated but not bulky. The fabric has a matte feel and will be easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: ABeck

customer_reviews.title: No phone number to call for help....
customer_reviews.text: I received the jacket today and fully charged the battery pack. However the jacket will not turn on and heat! I’ve emailed customer service because I'm going on a trip in 5 days, but they have not responded nor do they have a number you can call! I will wait a couple of days, but in the meanwhile, I have to go buy another jacket in the event they don’t respond!! I like the jacket, but I can go to REÍ and buy a regular cold weather jacket for less. So far I’m not liking having to wait for customer service to email me.
customer_reviews.author: EST

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket about a year and a half ago and have worn it only about 5 times. The zipper sticks constantly and is very difficult to close. Also, my entire reason for buying this was because it is supposed to heat up--which it no longer does. It worked the first couple of times and now it is just a plain jacket. You can buy a more attractive jacket that doesn't heat up and probably zips easier, and costs less. Sorry, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Have had the jacket since oct 22nd. It stopped working less than a month later. The jacket is cute so i'm going to try for a replacement and hope the one i got was just defective. I am however disappointed in the customer service a ororo. I sent them a message and they have yet to respond. One more chance... or i will be returning and not buying ororo products ever again Update...got replacement. It too stopped working one month later! Time for a refund! DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I would get a size larger than normal so you have room to really move, and so you could wear a sweater/sweatshirt underneath. Other than that, this jacket is AWESOME! I work outside in the colds and this jacket makes it so much more enjoyable. I can’t even begin to describe how much I like this jacket! It’s got a lightweight feel of a spring jacket with the warmth of a winter coat (when turned on). I even bought an extra battery pack for my 16 hour work days.
customer_reviews.author: SIdney M.

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Jacket runs really big. I'm usually a medium/large but the medium is like a large or close to xl. The zipper is really hard to pull up, seems like it will break fairly soon. Otherwise it seems to heat well but it should be tighter to actually feel the heat I think. Update. Battery won't fully charge anymore. It did once, died a few hours later and now won't charge past 2.
customer_reviews.author: alycia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is a godsend if you hate cold as much as I do. Such a brilliant product and keeps me comfortable outside in the cold when I absolutely hate winter and cold. It's so easy to set up and use. I love the different heat settings too to customize it. It heats up fast too! Barely any waiting The coat itself is so well made down to the stitching. It's not only beautiful but sleek but comfortable with the lining, has a great hood, and several pockets that are handy. Zipper is sturdy and strong. I absolutely love this, this will be my bff all winter long
customer_reviews.author: Dianna S.

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a return item.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Mine was missing some of the accessories. I could only surmise it was a return from someone before. I did not get the case. Nor the universal adapter, nor the boxes they came in. My daughter’s had all of that with hers. If I had not bought two I would have never known. They were really good about giving a refund and I did repurchase another only because I really liked the coat. That one all was well as it came with everything. Not a return.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good heat. Heavy battery. Below average stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and it produces a very good level of heat for her. The battery is heavy for her and hard on her neck/shoulders but she has always had issues with that so it probably won't bother most. We ended up hanging the battery to a belt holster that we rigged up. Also, she's had this less than a year but the stitching started to come apart on the inside. She was able to sew it up herself and still likes it enough to wear almost every day. Despite these problems, we would buy this again for the look and heat performance.
customer_reviews.author: Koolbuys

customer_reviews.title: 5 Raves!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleasantly surprised to find this level of quality in a garment, having gotten accustomed to sloppy stitching and cranky zippers. Every little detail seems to have been fussed over, down to the soft, fuzzy, cuff lining. The heat feels soothing, and I think it's going to turn me into a big fan of winter. It works, it fits, it's perfectly lovely. Shipping did seem to take a long time, but since this was disclosed up front, I was not concerned. The wait was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neufeldt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent warm jacket. Cute fit too.
customer_reviews.text: Great thick quality jacket. Looks like my northface but way thicker. Very warm without the heat on. The battery and heat power are extremely strong. I use for motorcycle riding in WAshington state ALL year long. Works perfect. A cute stylish fitted jacket. Fits as expected. I am a small and i ordered a small. Super happy with purchase. Would recommend to a friend for sure. I did NOT get any discounts for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this jacket for 3 months and i charged the battery and it works fine. But when i plug it in to my jacket it doesnt work. I expected when spending $160 on a jacket it would atleast last longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ana blagojevic

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket for cold winters!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this coat. The low setting is usually plenty to keep me warm outside. I use it as a normal winter coat. It's warm enough even without the heat! I also use it for long distant hikes in the summer. Last winter I did a 12 mile hike, not expecting to be out that long. The coat helped me stay warm the entire time. It also charges my phone if I need it! The battery does take a very long time to charge. But if you buy a spare, you can just trade them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa  Zittel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heated Jacket
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that is fits me perfectly and it’s really good for a cold windy day. Just press the button on the upper part and It warms up as you like. I enjoyed using it. It’s very comfortable and it looks great on me. I can’t wait to use it more. I really like this awesome. jacket. I’ll recommend it to my family and friends. Thank you for sending it. It was well packed and it came on time. Happy customer. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent materials all around, even zipper is rugged. Warms FAST. Sleeves a bit long for a small...
customer_reviews.text: Wife LOVES it. She is 100lbs all day long and 4'9" pretty short but not for her weight and ordered a small which has pretty long sleeves for a small. like about 1.5" of overhang so she rolled them up at the cuff. In my opinion, the sleeves on the small should be a little shorter. I even put my arm in and I'm 5' 9" and weigh 170LBs and the sleeve on a SMALL were even long for me...granted I couldn't out the coat on without GREEN HULKING it (LOL) but the sleeves are definitely a bit longer than should be for a size S. Not a complaint, just know this might be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Faslane Tech

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket - very warm even without the heat turned on. It runs a bit big. I'd normally wear a size M so I can wear normal clothes under it. This one is a bit roomier. I probably could have gotten away with a S. For reference I'm 5'5" and approx 140 lbs. The heating elements warm up quickly and are quite toasty. The battery takes some getting used to. Although it's small, it's still bulky and mildly heavy. The warmth of the jacket cancels out that 'negative'. Totally worth the money though!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this jacket the first time it was too small, no big deal. Then when I order the correct size it's not prime eligible so it cost $20 more than it did originally and no free returns. The fit is awkward, it looks fine but it isn't comfortable overall, the flaps at the collar were constantly in my face but the jacket is so stiff you can't move them. It also isn't warm enough to be useful in real winter (snow) so I paid $20 to wait 1-2 weeks for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lynn

customer_reviews.title: sizes are small - customer service was good.
customer_reviews.text: Jacket runs REALLY small - the XL is more like a US medium or perhaps large. That is why my review is mediocre. I will say that the customer service was really good from this supplier - CSA. I was a little nervous at first as i never heard of them but I dealt with Sylvia and she was very helpful in processing my returns!
customer_reviews.author: Pseudoboy

customer_reviews.title: Not that hot.
customer_reviews.text: The coat itself is super comfortable. Soft and just super Cozy. However just seemed that on its hottest setting outside in 28 degree weather it did little more than a hot hands package for gloves. I charged the battery to full when I got it, but seemed the only warmth came from the lining not the heating element. You can feel the wires when you touch the jacket, but you can’t tell when wearing it, which is a huge plus. Overall I bought a heated jacket but it’s not much better than a nice coat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Warner

customer_reviews.title: Quality, customer service, great product
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered both the men and women’s heated jackets for the agents in my office. Sizes ranging from small to large, seven in all. Delivery system was excellent packaging also was excellent and the timeframe in which I receive them was very good. This company has a high professionalism and an outstanding customer service. Everyone is extremely happy with their heated jackets. I also got one for my daughter she has to work outside a lot in the cold. This heated jacket keeps her nice and warm and the batteries last as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie E. Napier

customer_reviews.title: One season only
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful the first season. Now in the second season it does not work. In the off season it hung in the closet. I charged the battery pack this season and the lights indicate that it’s fully charged, but it does not work when you plug the coat into the battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tamica Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I just got the jacket and it is very nice looking and seems to be quite warm. I will update after I wear it to my granddaughter’s softball game! Other reviewers seemed to feel the jacket runs smal so I ordered a medium. I could have worn a small, (5’1” & 125 lbs) but I don’t want to pay to send it back to exchange. Hopefully the medium will be fine when I wear it with a thick sweatshirt. The collar is very tall and a bit stiff as other reviewers found. But, I like the way the hood tucks into the collar to really keep the cold out.
customer_reviews.author: readerinTN

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket has honestly been a lifesaver for me. I get cold very easily, and I've been able to go out at night, staying warm; it's fantastic in cold rainy weather, and sometimes I use it in the house if it's too cold. The battery lasts a pretty long time, on high heat it stays on for about 3 hours, and low/medium will last a whole day out. You generally don't want to bundle up under it: wear a thin t-shirt so the heat is in close contact with your skin. I live in a mild climate, so I don't know how it works in snowy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Z

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work or turn on
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Didn’t turn on after charging overnight. Very disappointed. Collar on jacket is very annoying. Hits right above the chin. Ladies. If you wear makeup expect to have it all over the jacket collar
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself appears fine however it was too large for my wife. We have not been able to return it because they make it near impossible. First you have to fill out paperwork and wait for them to contact you. They never contacted us! Here we sit months later and still no word. Do not buy this jacket if you even think you'll have to return it due to size issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I usually wear a small but I got a medium so it would fit a little loose in case I had a thicker shirt on. I bought to wear at work in the OR and it works!! The jacket itself is warm and I don’t even have to turn it on. Warms up quick. I use all week and recharge on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me toasty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made coat! It has kept me very toasty at my son’s baseball games and on Halloween. I am 5’5” 110 lbs so I wish they offered an XS because it’s definitely too big for me. The heat escapes out and I have to pull it tight to my body to really feel the heat. My only complaint is the collar. It’s really stiff and large. It’s not bad if I have it zipped all the way up but it’s awkward if it’s not. I’m thinking about adding a little snap on each side so I can secure it down out of my face when I’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaP

customer_reviews.title: Love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket. Sizing was a little tough—I’m small on top but a little bigger in the hips. I have their heated vest and had to go up a size to medium. So I thought I would have to do the same here since it was fitted. I purchased both the small and the medium because I wasn’t sure—But the small fit perfectly (actually, a little big in the shoulder area). For reference, I’m 5’2”, 120 lbs. I love how it heats!! On a side note, I’m not a vest person but my husband got me the vest as well and I love that too—I use that often this winter, which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Connie J.

customer_reviews.title: If it worked it would be great. Ladies, these are sized  for men
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is warm and great if the battery pack works even if It’s not super fashionable for a small person-I ordered a medium and probably should have sized down, but that’s more on me. The really disappointing part is that the Battery pack only worked for one charge and then died. I need to follow up with the company to see if they will send a new working model.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week I absolutely loved it and then stopped working. I’m still giving two stars because I am getting a refund with no trouble so its worth a shot ordering it if you get one that doesnt break
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like its advertisement its trash and would not reccomend to buy
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt get warm as I expected especially the front all I can feel is the heat from the back which makes you back sweat this coat is terrible What you got to be naked to feel it 😂😂 advertising is completely false the picture is false I'm so disappointed my north face coat is warmer then this coat without the damn heat 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Bbirdleah

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I got this last month for Christmas for my wife. She has used it a dozen times or so and so far she absolutely loves it. It has been working perfectly since day one. No issues with fitment. I ordered a small and she is 5'3" and about 120lbs. She says it gets plenty warm even on the coldest days and no problems with the battery like previous reviews have stated. Maybe they fixed that issue. It powers on and powers off like you would expect. No disconnecting the battery or anything weird or quirky. It just works great. Love it! I really hope it lasts. We'll report back once it has some real age on it.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great. It fits well and it's very warm. The only thing I found odd is that the included charger doesn't actually charge the battery. Instead, i had to charge the battery pack using a micro usb cord (like the one for Android phones). Also, not included I the instructions is that you have to press the button to turn the battery pack on, and then press the button on the coat to turn the heat on. I've only had it for a week so I'll update during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: NicciJemz

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: I am a rural carrier in upstate ny for the post office. This past week we had highs of 17°. This coat was great. On the high setting it lasted about 3 hours. The medium setting lasted my whole route around 4.5 hours. I ordered a medium and I am 5'4 145 lbs and it fits great. The coat is very good quality and is waterproof and wind resistant for sure. The collar is a bit stiff but I can deal with that. I've never been warmer while working. I highly recommend if you work outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Laurin

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quick, is warm, and very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I absloutely love this jacket. I bought it to face the Midwest's crazy winters and it has not disappointed me! This jacket keeps me super warm, is able to be layered with, and compliments every outfit! My only complaint is the battery. I've had this jacket for over a year now and it annoys me that the battery will sometimes randomly shut off and I have to unzip the entire jacket, go into the battery compartment, unplug it, plug it in again, and then wait for the jacket to reheat up. That is my only complaint besides that everything else about this jacket is perfect. Great for us who don't like the cold!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Colbert

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this coat
customer_reviews.text: I live in New England and I bought this jacket to just attend sporting events in the cold. I have worn in twice since I have purchased it (about a week ago) and would say that this jacket is worth EVERY PENNY. It worked extremely well, and I was the only girl not complaining about the cold. The material of the jacket was also much high quality than I expected. I would love to purchase a second battery pack, because 2 hours on high simply isn't enough. Overall I would say this is the best investment I have made in a LONNNGG time!
customer_reviews.author: Gennifer Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Quality headed jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is so warm. I am always cold, and I live in Wisconsin, so I use this coat daily. It works amazing and keeps me warm. The battery lasts a while as long as you dont leave it on the highest setting all of the time. The battery is about the size of a cellphone and it sits inside your coat behind your left pocket. I don't notice it anymore. Only thing I don't like about it is it is a more bulky coat - but that helps to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie-Lee

customer_reviews.title: If your wife/girlfriend is always cold, you must get this Jacket
customer_reviews.text: So my girlfriend is always cold and we live in the middle of michigan go figure. So for christmas she did not know what she wanted and I was not going to let her shiver anymore. I came across this jacket and was like winner winner chicken dinner. She has used it to take the Doggo's outside for the few minutes and it keeps her warm, So if you don't get your spouse or significant other this jacket you gotta ask yourself do you really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, really is a slim fit.  Order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, seems to be good quality although has not had to stand the test of time yet. My wife enjoys the heat it gives off, helps in cold wisconsin winters but it's not the thickest, most insulated jacket out there so extra layer may be necessary depending on temp. The sizes do run a bit small like other reviews have mentioned. My wife is pregnant and not very large except for her belly and the xl is still too snug for her to wear right now. Might be a bit unfair to judge off a pregnant woman but that's all I can do. If you need more than a large maybe look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My skinny wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is cold all the time, always has multiple layers under her coat. She loves this thing. We live in Seattle , is can be damp. It is a little smaller than we thought but fits and looks good. I will need to get an extra battery cell so she can just recharge her battery from the other pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Slomchinski

customer_reviews.title: Battery only charges the first year
customer_reviews.text: I liked the jacket the first year. I wanted to wait and write a review after the first year because I wanted to see how well it held up. The jacket itself held up nicely. The battery pack is a whole different story. I got it out to use since I work outdoors and it’s starting to get cold. Well, the battery no longer charges. I had the battery charging for the past 3 hours, and it’s not charged at all. I’m disappointed because it was expensive and I enjoyed it very much last year. Now I’m going to have to waste more money on another jacket. I’m going with a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this coat. But there is something not right about it's charger. Does seem to hold a charge for more then 2 hours and it take 6 plus hours to charge it's pack. Also when you click the warm in icon on it you usually have to click it and replug in its battery a few times before it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tamzen

customer_reviews.title: Seller was very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This heated jacket is great. I purchased last year. Every time I wear it, people see the colored light on jacket and ask what it is. I have told so many people about the jacket, and they say they want one. A few weeks ago the battery wasnt working, i contacted the seller, who was VERY helpful. Sent me information on how to fix. However it still didnt work. The seller sent me a new battery. The jacket is heating again. Also, the new battery is a little smaller and lighter than the old one, which is a plus. I would definitely recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Tami L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm and toasty in the Northeast winter
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. Living in upstate NY is cold during the winter, but this coat keeps me cozy warm. The coat arrived earlier than expected (great surprise) and is made well. Only issue I had was the battery didn't last as long as it should and had a rattling sound. We bought a second battery to see if they were all that way but the new battery works great. Contacted the company, and after a little miscommunication, they sent a replacement battery right away. They were easy to work with and I recommend this product to anyone that gets cold!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats instantly
customer_reviews.text: Thought the length was longer but just perfect length. Not too long. Heats up instantly and super soft. Jacket is not too light but it’s not super heavy duty either
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I wouldn't say it works great if you're in temperatures below 25 degrees, but other than that it keeps a charge for quite a long time, is great for cold rooms and for driving in a cold car during the winter. I live in Ohio and it definitely does the job. The material is very high quality, water resistant, and insulating. It's nice to not have to wear bulky layers all the time when it's cold out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yosh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and 118 LBS and a size small fits perfectly. I love this jacket. I where it to Starbucks where I am always freezing. I'll be able to go there in the summer with this and not a down coat :). It works great. I haven't washed it yet. Paper instructions say not to machine wash even on gentle. Tag on jacket says machine wash on gentle okay. Battery lasts a long time. Downside is when you forget to plug it in before you go to bed. I don't blame the jacket for that though.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Shops

customer_reviews.title: Apparently I won at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my future mother in law who owns a trash removal company and has to be out in the cold in the wee hours of the morning. She loves it. She's constantly cold and this works perfectly for her. I even got a call from her today asking where I got it because she was gushing about it to a client and they wanted to get their own. I'm pretty sure I'm now her favorite kid XD
customer_reviews.author: AwkwardSlendy

customer_reviews.title: Cold weather approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket for those cold blooded people, snow board/sky trips, cold hiking places. The battery looks heavy. At first I wasn't sure if I was going to be ok with it. But, if you put your phone on the other side you get a perfect balance. I also have a bit of a broder shoulder and I was very pleased to see that the medium wasn't snug on my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jacket. I have to stand outside for about 45 minutes a day and direct traffic for my students at the end of the school day. This jacket kept me so warm. The heat penetrated into the pockets, and the heat vented out the top of my collar and warmed my face! I also sit outside a lot watching high school baseball and football games and this jacket with a blanket on my legs is amazing. Fit was perfect. Jacket is well made, and came with a nice storage bag. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kparrott

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with my heated jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: I work outdoors (chemical plants) and I hate to be cold!! I bought this and I am so thankful I did!! I work 10 hour shifts and if I keep it on low it'll last all 10 hours! So battery life does work as advertised. Which is a HUGE win!! I do wish it came with an extra battery pack, lol. Just to have for back up! But I saw that they can be purchased separately on here for $60.00 It is wind proof!! And water resistant! Anyways! Overall I am 100% happy with my jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Shay

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I have unrealistic expectations or if this really just does not warm up anywhere near what I would expect it to. I am returning and buying a down jacket instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buttons
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is a little too long for me, but overall works well. The heat in the back is a warm and nice. However than the one in the front isn’t very significant. One thing I really don’t like is that after I click the on button, then after using it and turn it off. The next time when I try to turn it on, it will not turn on unless I unzip my jacket entirely and get to the inner bottom pocket where battery is at to disconnect it and reconnect it just so that I can turn the heat on again from using the button up front.
customer_reviews.author: Qiying

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this jacket, I really wanted to like it. I’m always cold and need a heated jacket so I saw this one and decided to take the plunge and buy it. I got a small and It was very, very stiff and itchy. I tried it on with the heat on and it did not get that warm. I’m also looking for more of a fleece heated jacket and this was more like a winter jacket. Looks like I’ll still be looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This is a must buy for people who get cold easily.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket makes winter OK!!! Seriously love this jacket and I can’t believe I have made it in life this far without it. It heats up SO fast and its funny because I am out and about and everyone else looks like they are miserable and freezing and I am actually enjoying being in the cold. If you get cold easily or are just looking for extra comfort, you will not be disappointed by making this investment. If you are able to - purchase the extra battery pack. The battery life is great I can use mine multiple daysbut if it goes out it takes a half day or so to charge back up.
customer_reviews.author: RB Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Defective-Worked ONE day
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Received my jacket on Friday. Charged the battery overnight. Wore it Saturday and it worked great. Then on Sunday, it just didn’t work. I’ve emailed the company, hopefully they’ll make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Taurean

customer_reviews.title: The coats appearance is fantastic and very stylish looking.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a petite person she said it seemed a little snug for a medium size and thinks she may not be able to wear a sweatshirt underneath it but it should work fine. The battery seemed a little heavy but I think that is perfectly understandable for what it is providing power for and for how long. Overall, pleased with the product as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Can’t feel the heat
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for cold weather camping and I layered up so much under the coat that I didn’t feel the heating elements at all. I returned it for a heated vest but still couldn’t feel the heating elements so I said screw cold weather camping. I’ll wait for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Piccone

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!! Best Gift I've Ever Given!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend is always cold in winter. Like it physically hurts her, can't go out in it. I got her this jacket for Christmas and to say it is a game changer is an understatement. It heats up so fast and gets so warm (but never dangerously so). The battery is slim and SUPER long lasting. This is the greatest gift I've ever given!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Thompson

customer_reviews.title: We love in CNY and she always cold in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother. We love in CNY and she always cold in the winter. She was apprehensive at first but wears it all the time now. It charges quickly and keeps her warm, whether going to the car, walking the dog or shoveling snow. It's no problem to wash, which is a huge plus. A little expensive, but living up to it! It does run just a touch small, so if you like things a little looser, consider buying a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Reese

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: When I received my jacket, I had trouble getting the battery to charge. I thought it was a faulty charger so they sent a new charger. I managed to get one charge and then nothing. The company is wonderful. They send a new battery and that was the problem. I totally enjoy being much warmer at night ballgames. I got a large because I worried the medium might be too snug. I think I could have worn the medium. The jacket and the company served me well.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket! Very warm. Gets lots of attention because of the light, be prepared to explain almost every where you go. Battery life isn't the greatest, but not terrible. I usually get about 3 days out of it, using it around 2 hours each day (so 6 hours on a charge) on the medium setting. Battery pack is hardly noticeable in front pocket area, unlike other name brands that gouge you in the back/side. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rayna V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavyweight material for a lightweight coat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and it was about a size bigger than expected. It was not fitted through the torso as the picture shows so was much bigger through that part of the coat. It is a very heavyweight material and seems that it would be wind resistant. The battery did come up to full charge after the expected 5-6 hours and worked well for the short duration that we tried it. Hoping it will continue to work well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. The heat isn't too direct it feels like it distributes well. The battery charges fast, kinda bulky though. I got a large (I thought I ordered xl) it's a little snug but it works. I can wear a hoodie underneath just fine. My only problem is the light button on the chest. It's so bright. I wish it were hidden because I definitely stick out when it's dark.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Masterman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about this coat. I got it for a great price on Black Friday but it’s worth every penny of the full price. I love the fit of the slim cat. It’s very warm without turning the heat on. It is true you have to in zipper jacket to unplug the battery but that’s a minor inconvenience with all its greatness!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely order this again, and if they offered pants I would order those too! It is really warm even without the heaters being on. The collar can be zipped up high but doesn't choke me. It works well with my motorcycle helmet. I wear it even when I don't ride my bike because it is a really nice jacket. My co-workers are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: bbo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for cold hikes. The material of the jacket seems sturdy and well made. Upon initial use of the battery - half of the battery life was gone in 15 minutes on HIGH heat. Definitely did not last as advertised. The purpose of buying this jacket is basically defeated if the heating aspect lasts such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Marieanne

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this jacket for my wife who's always cold in the winter...........she loves the jacket and the heat is great.........the outside light indicator is great when young kids look at it - they love to press it.......it would be 5 stars only if the battery life was a little longer.......but I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hannsgen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on camping trips and it's so nice to not be freezing when we're out late by the fire talking and it starts to get chilly. Not me, I'm nice and toasty in my heated jacket. All of my friends have ordered this jacket after trying on mine as well as the vest which I think I will purchase next.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Even heating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for my daughter, who has some medical issues that make the cold weather very difficult to tolerate. The jacket itself provides fair insulation from cold weather. The heat was of rapid onset, and was even throughout the center portion of the garment. We had the first one for about a week before the battery bit the dust. Initially, it lasted about 8 hours or more on high heat, but it quickly dropped to about 20-30 minutes. The merchant provided a very easy return, and a new jacket arrived within a few days, no questions asked. The replacement has functioned very well for the last several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Schlechter, MD

customer_reviews.title: Works well but battery pack needs charging weekly with regular use.
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice jacket. Lightweight and flexible for doing outside chores. The sizing is a little small. I usually wear Medium and Large was what I got which is small for Large. There are 3 heat settings. The high setting uses the battery quickly. The instructions were not clear to me and it took me a while to find where to turn it on. Of course, now it is no problem. The chest and back are the warm places. I take disposable hand warmers when it is really cold. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Love look and feel out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t hooked up battery pack and worn yet. Fits perfectly. I would have ordered a size larger to fit over bulky winter gear, but friend advised against it. She says the jacket works better close to the body. You can put outer gear on top if needed to hold in heat. I’m glad I followed her advice. The jacket is form-fitting and should be perfect for layering.
customer_reviews.author: JSue Wagner

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit. Sleek and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 38DD on top so I got an XL. Fits perfectly with room for layering and scarves. Sleek, simple, but sophisticated look. Very impressed. The warming function is an added bonus! I'm excited to try it out when the weather gets colder.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Review

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, well insulated and made of great durable material.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, I ordered a small, since I am very petite. The battery seems to last long time, so far Ive gotten about 5 hours on the medium setting, and still had half of the battery still charged. Battery is a little more heavier than I expected. The jacket is thicker, well insulated, which is not what I was expecting, and I am so happy it is, becuase it retains the heat better and keeps me warmer longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Warm and a nice design!
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket, it keeps me warm and it looks good. I am giving it 4 stars because the side pockets do not heat up to keep your hands warm. I just found out that a friend of mine has a similar jacket and the only difference is that her side pockets have warmers otherwise I strongly recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, great battery life and my new favorite coat
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this coat to wear at work in the frigid winter mornings (construction) but I wear it EVERYWHERE! It's nice looking and very durable! I love that the battery pack has a USB port to charge my phone also and lasts for multiple days/uses. The hood zips off which I find very convenient so I can layer another coat on top so I don't ruin it. The 3 settings is really nice so I'm not fighting with being too hot or too cold. I will definitely purchase from this company again and have referred anyone that asks about my coat. Thank you for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsi Carlson

customer_reviews.title: 2 Gifts LOVED by the receivers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these gorgeous heated jackets for my gals who work outside for extended periods of time at our cold Northern Arizona Farm. They both have worn the jackets (given before Christmas as winter has arrived!!) and absolutely love these jackets, from design to the heated features to the convenience of turning them on and off as needed. I highly recommend them as they are not only wonderfully functional, they look so much better than other heated jackets I was looking at that had a higher $$ tag.
customer_reviews.author: Paki

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Slim fitted heated jacket for my wife for Christmas. She wore it for light normal daily use January through March. She noticed when going to put it away for the spring that the hood is beginning to separate from the jacket after this short period. I don't think I've ever ha a jackets that didn't last years and this only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: therock11

customer_reviews.title: Battery Not Up To The Task
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the jacket, although I think the collar is stiff and rides too high, but the real shortcoming of this jacket is the battery. The battery is depleted in short time just being plugged into the jacket. If you wear it on a day where you know it will get colder later, like when the sun goes down, unplug the battery until you absolutely need it. It's a very nice sporty jacket, and it will get hot, but it won't last you more than just a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Henry McClain

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the day it arrived it was 70 degrees out so I haven’t had a real use for it yet. But I tried it on and it fits great and looks really good. Warmer than my other jackets on it’s own. Will update my review if it doesn’t end up working with the warming element.
customer_reviews.author: lynnrobin

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, this is the best investment to keeping me warm. I absolutely love this jacket. My co-workers were in awe when they seen it. I highly recommend this jackets. It’s not to bulky or too thin, it’s just right. I also like the the button in the front that glows when it’s on
customer_reviews.author: Paula H

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm without using battery
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is incredible! You don't feel the wind through it, it's water resistant and the material seems to hold in your body heat, ive never had to use the battery to stay warm and i live im Missouri where temps get into the teens with wind chill factors. Additionally, it's a sharp looking jacket. I wear a large shirt, am 5 4 but ended up buying a medium jacket because of how it fit at my shoulders. I would absolutley recommend this coat to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues
customer_reviews.text: Customer service has not lived up to addressing a battery issue. Battery won’t hold charge and takes forever to charge what it does take. I have written as well as the recipient has as thus was a Christmas gift. Can’t get an answer. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I swear I gave this a review of 3 star but good thing I cannot find it because I was going to change it to 5. Received the packaged but the battery was missing. I contacted Ororo on FB and immediately received a response. Battery packed and shipped the next day and I received it in 3. Great jacket and even better customer service. Will highly recommend. I wish I bought the one that heats up the chest as well. I purchased the men's padded but it heats up the back and hands instead of the back and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: I like this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket, good for when its somewhat cold (Like 45 degrees Fahrenheit) but this will definitely not keep you warm if it is very cold or snowing. The length is okay but the arms are a bit short for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice build and looks really comfortable and warm but was to small for my aunt. I might have just fit it and i am by no means on the bigger side. I ordered my aunt the XL as she’s a little bigger and it was to small. In clothing i wear a size 6-8 and the XL barely fit me nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Aries Dragon

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr review....still lives it!!
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves it!! Durable coat still looks new after year. 1st battery died, but in its defense it was charged and drained every day during late fall thru late spring (she is a freeze baby) and again partially thru this season. New batteries are $50 ish, so good to know.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: You will need to wash right out of sealed bag
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but it Reeks of cigarette smoke. Came double bagged and the final bag is sealed. When I opened it and put it on it smells like I'm a smoker. It is even in my hair when I took it off. Hate to wash it more than needed because of it being electric.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Best gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got it for me as a gift, and I love it! I usually wear a medium on everything. This jacket runs on the larger size, I could have used a small, but continuously use it and the battery is great, you can even charge your phone with it (is essentially a battery pack) it lasts a long time and is very warm. After that we order one jacket for my husband, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: NSB

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was great at first and i agree with the people who rated it well. When it works it is great, but the battery randomly broke after one use. I figured it must have been a defective one so i requested to return it, thinking I would buy it again to get one that worked. customer service never got back to me. I've tried multiple times to get in contact and they never respond. I would have rated it higher if they at least got back to me, but it is an expensive jacket to not work.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coat. Keeps very warm. Sized down on size as it is roomy. Want it more fitted to feel the heat. Was able to wear long sleeve tee and this coat for several hours outside on regular basis in Michigan cold winters. Did not find a need for second battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure love
customer_reviews.text: For the winter these are outstanding. Battery life is great. Charge time is rapid, had never failed and warms up fast. Their comfortable and stylish. The fit is spot on. I have no complaints, it’s a better value then objects much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: David Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, we live in Maine and she works in the dairy department at a local store. The coat is well made, warm and the heating feature has simply delighted her. She is a scrawny little ginger. Not much body fat to keep her warm. I would definitely recommend this item. Very easy to charge and the charge lasts her entire shift. and the light on the jacket helps her find her key lock on the car or to light her way, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky P

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of the jacket. I am a little hippie so the jacket does not come down all the way. It is definitely warm. Charging a battery with super easy. I wish there was elastic around the waist where it could come down and tie up. Very small fitting jacket. I ordered the XL. It is still small.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Y Curry

customer_reviews.title: On the large side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. I started with the large because I was told they ran small, well no it ran very large. Replaced it with a medium and it is still a bit big. And on the medium the neck is so bulky that it bothered my wife enough that we will be sending it back again and looking for something else. I am bummed because my friends who have them love them.
customer_reviews.author: George Noyes IV

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, SO SOFT & COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Fits so well and heats up nicely ! I’m 5’9 115 lb 32DD and the small fits perfectly. This jacket keeps you so warm without the heat. Turn it on and you’re so cozy ! I was surprised how little battery power it uses. Definitely a must for cold weather !!! Bought the men’s for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Riverwindforest

customer_reviews.title: This jacket was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fitted jacket. My mom usually likes things oversized, so I ordered a size Large (she’s usually a medium) but the jacket fits nicely. Not too snug, but not oversized by any mean. The charger is nice and directions are clear. We tested the jacket out and it warmed up nicely in just a couple of minutes! It was a hit for my mom who is notoriously cold all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Zipper came off
customer_reviews.text: The zipper fell off once I zipped up the jacket for the first time. Makes me question the whole jacket itself.
customer_reviews.author: Joane Pacleb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present last year (2019) for my sister who at times has to walk to work. She absolutely loves it and gets nothing but complements about it all the time. This year I am buy my Mom one as well as myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Received a used jacket
customer_reviews.text: I received a used jacket. There were no tags, no instructions on the heating element, stains on the front and collar. It was packaged in a bag that stated it was used. However the item description was for a new jacket. I didn't try it on and immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

product_meta.title: ORORO Women's Slim Fit Heated Jacket with Battery Pack and Detachable Hood
feature_bullets: 100% Polyester; Model is 5'7" and wearing a size small.

STYLISH DESIGN WITH BREATHABLE FABRIC: Soft shell fabric exterior and breathable linning ensures you don't lose any excess heat and enjoy comfortable warmth; Detachable hood is specially designed for chilly mornings and extra protection on windy days; Slim-fit design relieves you of worrying about bulkiness.

HEAT ACROSS BODY: 3 carbon fiber heating elements generate heat across core body areas (left & right chest, mid-back); Adjust 3 heating settings (High, medium, low) with just a simple press of the button.
QUICK AND LONG-LASTING WARMTH: Heat quickly in seconds with 7.4V UL/CE-certified battery; Up to 10 working hours; USB port for charging smartphones and other mobile devices.
FOR ALL WALKS OF LIFE AND ADVENTURES: Ideal and warm choice for you, family members, friends, employees, to enjoy outdoor activities.
NO WORRIES AT ALL: Machine washable. The carbon fiber heating elements and jacket construction are designed to endure 50+ machine wash cycles.
